name: UICollectionReusableView
desc: A view that defines the behavior for all cells and supplementary views presented by a collection view.

items.name: var reuseIdentifier: String?
items.desc: A string that identifies the purpose of the view.

items.name: func prepareForReuse()
items.desc: Performs any clean up necessary to prepare the view for use again.

items.name: func preferredLayoutAttributesFitting(UICollectionViewLayoutAttributes) -> UICollectionViewLayoutAttributes
items.desc: Gives the cell a chance to modify the attributes provided by the layout object.

items.name: func apply(UICollectionViewLayoutAttributes)
items.desc: Applies the specified layout attributes to the view.

items.name: func willTransition(from: UICollectionViewLayout, to: UICollectionViewLayout)
items.desc: Tells your view that the layout object of the collection view is about to change.

items.name: func didTransition(from: UICollectionViewLayout, to: UICollectionViewLayout)
items.desc: Tells your view that the layout object of the collection view changed.
